multi_topic_discovery.topic_discovery_motivation: Impact: rates; Russian drone violations in the Baltic raise US 10Y Treasury yields by ~5‑10 bp during the 22‑25 Sep window as risk‑premium investors demand higher returns.

category.motivation: The article reports Turkey’s deployment of a warning and control aircraft to Lithuania in response to Russian drone violations, reflecting heightened geopolitical tensions and NATO’s defensive posture in Europe.

impact.motivation: The article concerns a NATO defense deployment, which does not directly affect any of the canonical market handles (indices, rates, FX, commodities, credit/vol) and lacks a clear causal link to market movements.

time_frame.motivation: The article reports a real‑time NATO deployment in response to Russian drone activity, an immediate geopolitical event that can influence defense sector sentiment and risk premiums in the short term.

article.title: Turkey deploys warning plane to Lithuania under NATO measures after Russian airspace violations
article.summary: Turkey has temporarily deployed a warning and control aircraft to Lithuania as part of NATO security measures following repeated airspace violations by Russian drones. The move has prompted the NATO alliance to increase its defence around Europe's eastern flank. The aircraft is capable of detecting low-flying drones and other objects that ground radars miss.
